code: import React from"react";import{Carousel}from"react-bootstrap";import'./ProjectsCard.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProjectsCard=_ref=>{let{title,description,items,technologies,images}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"project-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"title",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h6",{children:title})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"description",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Carousel,{children:images.map((imageSrc,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Carousel.Item,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"d-block project-image",src:imageSrc,alt:"Slide ".concat(index)})},index))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:description.map((text,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(React.Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:text}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{})]},index))})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:items.map((item,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:item},index))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"icons",children:technologies.map((tech,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"".concat(process.env.PUBLIC_URL,"/assets/icons/").concat(tech.toLowerCase(),".svg"),alt:tech,className:"icon"},index))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"technologies-names",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:["[",technologies.map(tech=>tech).join(", "),"]"]})})]});};export default ProjectsCard;
